Title: Increases penalties for individuals or companies who engage in the business of cashing checks, drafts or money orders for consideration without a license
Summary: Increases penalties for individuals or companies who engage in the business of cashing checks, drafts or money orders for consideration without a license; makes such violation a class E felony; provides for a fine of $2,500 for each transaction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to increasing the penalties for individuals or companies who engage in the business of cashing checks, drafts or money orders for consideration without a license
